rooms.description: North-facing entrance with wide doors for wheelchair accessibility. Complies with Vastu principles by orienting the entrance to the north.
Spacious Mediterranean-inspired living area with natural light from windows. Furniture arranged to facilitate movement for wheelchair accessibility.
Adjacent to the living room for ease of movement. Features include accessible table height and clear pathways.
Modern Mediterranean-style kitchen designed for accessibility. Layout includes a central island with wheelchair-friendly counter height.
Cozy library area dedicated to reading and study. Well-lit with natural light from a north-facing window.
Master bedroom located on the ground floor for convenience and wheelchair accessibility. Features include en-suite bathroom.
Additional bedroom designed with sufficient space and mobility clearances. Accessible closet placement.
Dedicated bedroom with open space and natural light. Follows Vastu guidelines for energy flow.
Additional bedroom ensuring privacy and accessibility. Features include clear pathways and ample space for wheelchair movement.
Accessible bathroom with grab bars and non-slip flooring. Provides essential facilities for ground floor convenience.

openings.description: North-facing main entrance with wheelchair accessible ramp leading to the entrance hall.
Large window in living room providing natural light and views.
Accessories to ventilate the kitchen space while ensuring privacy.
North-facing window in library area enhancing natural light as per Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom on the upper floor with accessible features including a wheelchair ramp or lift connecting floors if needed.
Final bedroom ensuring ample space and natural light. Follows Mediterranean aesthetic with local materials.
Accessible bathroom connected to one of the upper floor bedrooms. Includes grab bars and non-slip surfaces.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase with accompanying wheelchair-accessible lift for floor-to-floor connectivity.
Large window in the upper floor bedroom to ensure sufficient daylight and ventilation.
